attributes.action: Hold a referendum on an independent Northern England.
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that The North is an economically, culturally and historically distinct nation. 

Northerners are not 'English' – they are Northumbrian. For much of this island's history, Northumbria was a historically independent nation with a unique system of government and set of traditions. 

COVID-19 has revealed that the North-South divide is built into the very fabric of the "United Kingdom."  There is only one solution: a North-South border. 

We demand freedom for the North.
attributes.background:
We believe that the UK Parliament should hold a referendum on an Independent Northern England. 

All those North of the Humber and South of Scotland have a fundamental right to autonomy from Westminster and Self-Rule. A 'yes' vote will lead to the establishment of a sovereign Northern Republic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Hold a referendum on creating a Devolved Parliament for Northern England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555283

Hold on a referendum on an Independent North of England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556284
